ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer
Class AbstractRenderer

java.lang.Object
  ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.AbstractRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
RendererInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
GL2DRenderer, GLES11Renderer, GLES20Renderer
public abstract class AbstractRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements RendererInterface

This class implements some, but not all of the common tasks of a renderer. Other renderers (software / hardware) should inherit from this class.

          Instantiates a new abstract renderer.
